function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity shopping and downscaling may lead to increased potential contacts and higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and potential outbreaks in densely populated commercial areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict ventilation and air filtration systems, reducing the size of shops, and increasing spacing between shoppers to minimize contact.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, ventilation systems, and social distancing monitoring technologies.","People":"Shoppers, employees, and residents in proximity to commercial areas.","Owner":"Shop owners, architects, urban planners, and local governments."},{"Description":"Aerosol transmission in closed vehicles and public transportation could lead to the spread of contagious diseases, including SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne spread of contagious diseases within closed transportation environments, leading to increased transmission rates.","Mitigation":"Enhancing ventilation systems in vehicles, promoting outdoor transportation methods such as walking and cycling, and implementing strict hygiene and mask-wearing protocols.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, outdoor transportation infrastructure, and hygiene monitoring technologies.","People":"Passengers, drivers, and individuals using public transportation.","Owner":"Transportation authorities, vehicle manufacturers, and public health agencies."}]}
